name: Mark Spicoluk
description: '''Mark Spicoluk''' is a Canadian content creator, yoga instructor, musician, podcaster, and entrepreneur. He is best known as co-creator and yoga teacher for the lifestyle brand Boho Beautiful, his time as bass player with [[Avril Lavigne]], and as the vocalist and bassist for the punk rock band [[Closet Monster (band)|Closet Monster]]. From 2012 to 2015 he appeared as a judge on YTV's ''[[The Next Star]]''. He is also known as the founder of the indie record label [[Underground Operations]], and his production credits on albums by artists such as [[Protest the Hero]], [[Abandon All Ships]], [[Stereos]] and [[DVBBS]]. Along with his musical and business accomplishments, he is also a strong animal rights and social justice advocate.
